context.description: MQInput node Use the Resequence node to control the sequence in which a group (or groups) of incoming messages are propagated in a message flow.
Properties navigator This displays the node properties. Configure the node by selecting the properties and setting their values. Mandatory properties are marked with an asterisk.

topic.label: Resequence node - Configuring the Resequence node

context.description: Description page If you want to describe the purpose of the node in the message flow, use these fields to enter a short description, a long description, or both.

topic.label: Resequence node - Configuring the Resequence node

context.description: Basic page Settings for working with the Resequence node.

topic.label: Resequence node - Configuring the Resequence node

context.description: Advanced page Set properties that determine how messages are resequenced: for example, whether to store resequence state persistently.

topic.label: Resequence node - Configuring the Resequence node

context.description: Instances page Set values for the properties that control the additional instances that are available for a node.

topic.label: Resequence node - Configuring the Resequence node
